      • checkIfTimeIsInOfficeHrs

        public static boolean checkIfTimeIsInOfficeHrs​(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                               java.time.LocalDateTime end)
        Checks if start and end time is with in EST business hours of 8AM to 10PM. Appointments must be in the same day to be true.
        Parameters:
        start - Start time of appointment.
        end - End time of appointment.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean value of true if appointment is in office hours and false if it is not.

      • checkIfUpdatedApptOverlapsWithOtherAppts

        public static boolean checkIfUpdatedApptOverlapsWithOtherAppts​(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                                               java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                                               int apptId)
        Checks if the updated appointment time overlaps with other appointments.
        Parameters:
        start - Start time of appointment.
        end - End time of appointment.
        apptId - Appointment ID of selected appointment.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the start or end time of the appointment overlaps another appointment, and returns false if it does not.

      • checkIfNewApptOverlapsWithOtherAppts

        public static boolean checkIfNewApptOverlapsWithOtherAppts​(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                                           java.time.LocalDateTime end)
        Checks if a proposed new appointment time overlaps with existing appointments in the database.
        Parameters:
        start - Start time of new appointment.
        end - End time of new appointment.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the appointment time overlaps and false if it does not.

      • updateAppointment

        public static void updateAppointment​(Appointments updatedAppt)
        Updates an existing appointment in the Appointments table in the database.
        Parameters:
        updatedAppt - Updated appointment object containing information from the update appointment form.

      • addAppointment

        public static void addAppointment​(java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String description,

                                  java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                  int customerId,
                                  int userId,
                                  int contactId)
        Adds a new appointment to the Appointments table in the database.
        Parameters:
        title - title of new appointment.
        description - Description of new appointment.
        location - location of new appointment.
        type - type of new appointment.
        start - start time of new appointment.
        end - end time of new appointment.
        customerId - customer ID of new appointment.
        userId - user ID of new appointment.
        contactId - contact ID of new appointment.
